mayTakeAFewSeconds: This may take a few seconds.

login.info: Currently this application is under alpha testing and it is open to a limited number of people. If you cannot login that means you are not an alpha tester. Please come back later.
login.failedInfo: Dear {{username}} Sorry, but you cannot access to this site.

home.welcomeMessage: This website is still under construction. Please navigate to the old website if you like to play.

game.typeWordHere: Type here your word or click on the tiles.
game.selectLetterOrType: Pick a letter tile or type a word in the text box.
game.wordDoesNotExist: Given word does not exists in the dictionary.
game.wordExists: Given word exists in the dictionary.

singlePlayer.info: Wizard to create a new single player game. Select the options and click on the button below.
